news.content:
ðŸš¨ Limited L2 Validator Spots Remain!


L2 Validators play a key role in the decentralization of ThreeFold and securing our peer-to-peer Internet. They are rewarded for this, with a share of the grid's revenue! And running a validator is not a complicated task. Become a validator today.


  • ðŸ“š Learn more about L2 Validators and get involved!
  • ðŸ’¬ Share the love and spread the word: Twitter | LinkedIn
news.excerpt: Sign up for one of the limited L2 validator spots remaining and play a crucial role in the future of ThreeFold!
